text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for streaming games is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1070. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The screen brightness is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Acer Predator Helios 500 PH517-51-72NU 17.3" 144 Hz IPS GTX 1070 8 GB VRAM i7-8750H 16 GB Memory 1 TB HDD + 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for streaming games. The NVIDIA GTX 1070 in the Acer Predator Helios 500 PH517-51-72NU 17.3" 144 Hz IPS GTX 1070 8 GB VRAM i7-8750H 16 GB Memory 1 TB HDD + 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.
